items.sentence: I can\'t thank you enough for the help you\'ve given me.

Tom complained that he didn\'t have enough time to read.
Tom couldn\'t believe that Mary had actually kissed him.
Tom couldn\'t count to ten until he was three years old.
Tom couldn\'t decide whether to go to Boston or Chicago.

The last time I saw Tom he was headed towards the beach.
